DESCRIPTION: Placed in your first empty bubble slot. Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage OR Bubble with no empty bubble slots, your first Bubble pops and its card is put into your hand.
Pop bubbles and put their cards into your hand. If no bubbles remain, draw from the bottom of the draw pile.
Adjusts your Flood level based on the direction of the current.
Deal 15% less damage with attacks. Take 25% more damage from attacks.
Drowning creatures take damage at the end of their turn, then damage from Drown increases by 50% (rounded down). Lasts 3 turns unless reapplied.
